front.title: A YANG Network Data Model for Inventory Topology Mapping

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG data model to map the network inventory data with the topology data to form a base underlay network. The data model facilitates the correlation between the layer (e.g., Layer 2 or Layer 3) topology information and the inventory data of the underlay network for better service provisioning, network maintenance operations, and other assessment scenarios.
